# SpringBoneCollisionPlane3D

**Inherits:** [SpringBoneCollision3D](SpringBoneCollision3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An infinite plane collision that interacts with [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An infinite plane collision that interacts with [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md). It is an infinite size XZ plane, and the +Y direction is treated as normal.
